ContentDescription: WORD SEARCHWelcome to the best auto-generated Word Search app for Android:AppDrac's Word Search is a light application, ideal for spending hours of entertainment and training our minds. It is suitable for both adults and young people, since the game incorporates general culture themes. In short, one of the best hobbies.Have fun both alone and in a group, solving your favorite word puzzles.1.- Word Search has 21 themes to choose from:      - Animals      - Countries of the world      - History      - Cities of the world      - Cities of US      - American presidents      - Trademarks      - Names      - Geography      - Astronomy      - Comic characters      - Chemical elements and their symbols      - Sports and games      - Fruits, vegetables and mushrooms      - Roman emperors      - Professions and trades      - Singers and musical groups      - Actors and actresses      - Math      - Symbols      - Roman numerals2.- Word Search has six levels of difficulty:      - Very easy      - Easy      - Half      - Difficult      - Very difficult      - Extreme3.- Alphabet Soup has two game modes:      - Help activated (words pending to be found are shown)      - Without help (only the number of words pending to be found is indicated)5.- Available in many languages:      - Spanish      - English      - Italian      - French      - PortugueseTHE GAME: WORD SEARCHThe board adapts to the screen size and ..... you can play.The game mechanics are very simple; since several words of the chosen theme are hidden in a grid of cells full of letters.All you have to do is search for a word and, when you find it, mark it with your finger from the first letter to the last.
